title: What award did actress Bella Thorne win for directing porn film Him & Her?
text:
Bella Thorne accepts her award at the Porn Hub Awards (Picture: Jerod Harris/Getty Images)

Bella Thorne, former Disney starlet and actress, has just gone and won herself an award for directing a porn film.

The 22-year-old star was awarded the Vision Award during the 2nd annual Pornhub Awards in LA on Saturday.

Attending the awards show in a black, sparkling suit, Bella said she was ‘honoured’ to receive the accolade.

But why did Bella Thorne win a Pornhub award at the weekend?

Why did Bella Thorne win a Pornhub award?

Bella Thorne won a Pornhub award for her directorial debut, Him & Her.

The film, which was released through Pornhub premium, is about a: ‘relationship between a male and a female and this fight over dominance,’ and was described by Pornhub vice president Corey Price as, ‘a modernistic, sexually explicit ‘Romeo and Juliet’-like depiction of two star-crossed lovers who have unbridled sexual longing for each other.’

Bella said she was ‘honoured’ to have her work and vision recognised at the awards. (Picture: Phillip Faraone/Getty Images)

Starring porn stars Small Hands and Abella Danger, the film premiered in Germany during the Oldenburg Film Festival.

The sexually explicit flick is the first time Bella has tried her hand at directing and in a statement about the movie she said: ‘Breaking the taboo of what’s classified as beautiful has always been a vision of mine and it brings me such joy to see this being recognized for what it truly is…beautiful visionary art.’

While the former child star may have made her first foray into shooting adult movies and being awarded for her efforts, she’s not taking a step back from acting just yet.

The actress’ next project is a TV show called Paradise City, based on the film American Satan, in which she will star as character Lily Mayflower.
